entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
